message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANNOT_MODIFY_CLOSED_RECORD
message.locale: The place is 'Closed', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: The Place, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XFV_START_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XFV_DESIGNATED_CAPACITY_MUST_NOT_BE_LESS_THAN_PHYSICAL_CAPACITY
message.locale: The Designated Capacity %1n must be less than or equal to the Physical Capacity %2n.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANNOT_ENTER_ENDDATE_FOR_RESERVATION_WITHOUT_TO_DATE
message.locale: The End Date cannot be entered as the place has an 'Active' reservation without a To date.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANNOT_ENTER_ENDDATE_FOR_PLACEMENT_WITHOUT_TO_DATE
message.locale: The End Date cannot be entered as the place has an 'Active' placement without a To date.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_DESIGNATED_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_TO_COMPARTMENT
message.locale: The following place(s) are not of Type 'Designated':%1s and hence cannot be added to the compartment.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ALREADY_DELETED_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_TO_COMPARTMENT
message.locale: The following place(s) are already 'deleted':%1s and hence cannot be added to the compartment.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ALREADY_CLOSED_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_TO_COMPARTMENT
message.locale: The following place(s) are already 'Closed':%1s and hence cannot be added to the compartment.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_OUT_OF_USE_FROM_DATE_IS_EARLIER_THAN_PLACE_START_DATE
message.locale: The From Date, %1d, must be on or after the Start Date of the place, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_OUT_OF_USE_FROM_DATE_CANNOT_BE_LATER_THAN_TO_DATE
message.locale: The From Date, %1d, must be on or before the To date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE_AS_PLACEMENT_FROM_DATE_IS_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: This place has a placement starting from, %1z, it cannot be marked out of use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANNOT_ENTER_ENDDATE_PLACEMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: The End Date cannot be entered as this place has a placement starting from, %1z.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_WITH_ACTIVE_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This place has been used for placements, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_WITH_ACTIVE_RESERVATION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This place has been used for reservations, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_OCCUPIED_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This place, %1s, is 'Occupied', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_RESERVED_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This place, %1s, is 'Reserved', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANCELED_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This place, %1s, is '%2c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ALREADY_OCCUPIED_CANNOT_BE_ALLOCATED_TO_ANOTHER_CLIENT
message.locale: This place, %1s, is already Occupied, it cannot be allocated to another client.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CLOSED_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE
message.locale: This Place, %1s, is 'Closed', it cannot be marked out of use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANCELED_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE
message.locale: This place, %1s, has been deleted, it cannot be marked out of use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ALREADY_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE
message.locale: This place, %1s, is already 'Out of Use', it cannot be marked out of use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANCELED_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_IN_USE
message.locale: This place, %1s, has been deleted, it cannot be marked for use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CLOSED_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_IN_USE
message.locale: This place, %1s, has been 'Closed', it cannot be marked for use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ALREADY_AVAILABLE_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_IN_USE
message.locale: This place, %1s, is already 'Available', it cannot be marked for use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Name' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_START_DATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Start Date' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_REASON_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Reason' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ALTEAST_ONE_PLACE_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one place must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_NOT_OUT_OF_USE_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_FOR_USE
message.locale: %1n, place(s) are not 'Out of Use', they cannot be marked for use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ONE_OR_MORE_PLACES_NOT_OUT_OF_USE_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_FOR_USE
message.locale: One or more places are not '%1c'. Only places which are '%1c' will be marked for use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_CANNOT_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE_PLACEMENT_STARTING_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: %1n, place(s) cannot be marked out of use as they have placements starting in the future.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ARE_NOT_AVAILABLE_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE
message.locale: Some place(s) are not 'Available', they cannot be marked out of use: Occupied - %1n, Closed - %2n, Canceled - %3n.
Some place(s) are not 'Available', they cannot be marked out of use: Occupied - %1n, Closed - %2n, Cancelled - %3n.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: 'From Date' must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_FROM_DATE_ENTERED
message.locale: To date must be entered only if From date is entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Search Criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The To date, %1d, must be on or after the From date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_FROM_DATE_CANNOT_BE_EARLIER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The From date, %1d, cannot be earlier than current date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_FROM_DATE_CANNOT_BE_EARLIER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: The From date, %1d, must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_SERVICE_OFFERING_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Service offering search criterion must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XFV_DESIGNATED_CAPACITY_AND_PHYSICAL_CAPACITY_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: You must specify either designated or physical capacity for the provider first.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_RV_PLACE_TYPE_EMERGENCY_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This place is of Type "Emergency", it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_RV_PLACE_OCCUPIED_CANNOT_BE_MARKED_OUT_OF_USE
message.locale: This place is 'Occupied', it cannot be marked out of use.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_END_DATE_IS_EARLIER_THAN_PLACEMENT_TO_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the latest placement To date, %2z.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_END_DATE_IS_EARLIER_THAN_RESERVATION_TO_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the latest reservation To date, %2z.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_COMPARTMENT_CLOSED_CANCELED_PLACE_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The compartment, %1s, is %2c, place cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_COMPARTMENT_CLOSED_CANCELED_PLACE_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The compartment, %1s, is %2c, place cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_END_DATE_MUST_BE_EARLIER_THAN_COMPARTMENT_CLOSED_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, on the place, %2s, must be on or before the compartment Date Closed, %3d.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_NO_END_DATE_MUST_BE_EARLIER_THAN_COMPARTMENT_CLOSED_DATE
message.locale: The End Date on the place, %1s, must be on or before the compartment Date Closed, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XFV_MULTIPLE_SEARCH_CRITERIA_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either the Provider, Service or Provider Type can be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XFV_NO_SEARCH_CRITERIA_ENTERED
message.locale: At least one of either the Provider, Service or Provider Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_FV_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY
message.locale: The Date, %1d, must be on or after today.

message.name: INF_PLACE_XRV_NO_RECORDS_FOUND_FOR_SEARCH_CRITERIA_ENTERED
message.locale: No records found for the search criteria entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_START_DATE_IS_EARLIER_THAN_PROVIDER_ENROLLMENT_DATE
message.locale: The place Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider Enrollment Date, %2d.
The place Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider Enrolment Date, %2d.

message.name: PLACE_NAME
message.locale: Place
